days_before_symptoms.Note: Lauer, Stephen A., et al. The incubation period of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) from publicly reported confirmed cases: estimation and application. Annals of internal medicine 172.9 (2020): 577-582, time to onset of illness.

hospital_days.Note: Huang, Chaolin, et al. Clinical features of patients infected with 2019 novel coronavirus in Wuhan, China. The lancet 395.10223 (2020): 497-506, time to illness + onset to ARDS.

mild_days.Note: Lauer, Stephen A., et al. The incubation period of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) from publicly reported confirmed cases: estimation and application. Annals of internal medicine 172.9 (2020): 577-582 time to onset of illness.

ICU_days.Note: Zhou, Fei, et al. Clinical course and risk factors for mortality of adult inpatients with COVID-19 in Wuhan, China: a retrospective cohort study. The lancet 395.10229 (2020): 1054-1062, Time from illness onset to hospital admission days for survivors +ICU length of stay + time to onset.

die_days.Note: Zhou, Fei, et al. Clinical course and risk factors for mortality of adult inpatients with COVID-19 in Wuhan, China: a retrospective cohort study. The lancet 395.10229 (2020): 1054-1062, Time from illness onset to death + time to onset of illness.

max_infectious.Note: max number of days that a person with this level of infection stays sick for

case_severity.Note: distribution of severity of the case; those in None would be considered mild
